name: 光電子學
description: 本課程旨在介紹半導體光電元件包括介電質波導、半導體雷射、發光二極體、光偵測器、以及太陽能和光伏電池
goals: 了解半導體光電元件的物理、工作原理及應用
syllabus:
This course will be oriented towards graduate level of optoelectronics, and the focus of the course will be placed upon the semiconductor-based photonic devices that generate, propagate, and detect light using, including dielectric waveguides, light-emitting diodes, semiconductor interband lasers, semiconductor intersubband lasers, and photodetectors. 

The prerequisites of this course include undergraduate-level courses on electromagnetism, quantum physics, photonics, and semiconductor physics.
